title: BeSwitched in Time
description: When Surla returns home from her hexed adventure to the Morreau Kingdom, she finds nothing is the same...Idis lost her spunky edge as a now perfect Suzy-homemaker. Jax cut his hair and is dating snobby Tiffany. Worst of all, Cathy is more pathetically shy than ever before!When Surla also finds there's a darkness threatening to take over the entire community, she's even more determined to solve the mystery. And her new ability to shape-shift from a cat to a teenage girl on a whim may just be the magic she needs.
author: Molly Snow
